dcterms:creator: N.R. Benway
J.L. Preston
E.R. Hitchcock
Y. Rose
A. Salekin
W. Liang
T. McAllister
dcterms:description: The PERCEPT-R Corpus v2.2.2 consists largely of single-word citation speech audio recorded during longitudinal clinical trials of children with speech sound disorder impacting /ɹ/ and cross-sectional studies of age-match peers with typical speech. It includes 179,076 labeled utterances representing 662 single-rhotic words and phrases, with ground-truth labels generated by averaging binary listener ratings.
dcterms:title: PERCEPT-R Corpus

dcterms:creator: A. Eshky
M.S. Ribeiro
J. Cleland
K. Richmond
Z. Roxburgh
J.M. Scobbie
A. Wrench
dcterms:description: Ultrasuite is a repository of ultrasound and acoustic data from child speech therapy sessions, providing valuable resources for research in speech sound disorders.
dcterms:title: Ultrasuite

dcterms:creator: S.R. Li
S. Dugan
J. Masterson
H. Hudepohl
C. Annand
C. Spencer
R. Seward
M.A. Riley
S. Boyce
T.D. Mast
dcterms:description: This private dataset focuses on the classification of accurate and misarticulated /ɑr/ for ultrasound biofeedback using tongue part displacement trajectories, providing insights into speech sound disorders.
dcterms:title: Private dataset

dcterms:creator: M.S. Ribeiro
J. Cleland
A. Eshky
K. Richmond
S. Renals
dcterms:description: This corpus source exploits ultrasound tongue imaging for the automatic detection of speech articulation errors, contributing to the understanding of speech sound disorders.
dcterms:title: Corpus sources
